title: ChestCommands快捷菜单问题
author: Agger_
txt_content:
弄了个快捷菜单 把一个指令的显示图片弄成的稿 但是弄完之后稿是显示下面的攻击力的 怎么让那个攻击力不显示




@$F[{7$ZWQ{)~ZZ1LMF`GUW.png (13.22 KB, 下载次数: 23)

下载附件

1
2015-2-6 15:56 上传

replies.author: 龙玉涛
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: yzy_shuaige
replies.txt_content: 改不了的 游戏客户端必须要现实

replies.author: Agger_
replies.txt_content:
zhangzekai 发表于 2015-2-7 15:10
配置文件发一下
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&4FC快捷菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 3

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'menu'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)
  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
#   data-value: 0

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


spawn:
